description: Bejeweled 2 Deluxe is a popular puzzle video game published by PopCap Games. In the game, players move gems to create three-of-a-kind (or more) matches that clear gems and score points. After a player scores a certain amount of points, they advance to the next level.
In Endless mode and Puzzle mode, Bejeweled 2 Deluxe automatically saves a player's progress after they complete a level. These saved games are stored in BEJEWELED2DELUXESAVEDGAME files.
